objects.text:
• Includes 2 adorable cat figures
• Features spinning palm tree
  & hammock
• Comes with food bowls & toys

product_details.description: Welcome to your Barbie World. Build your best Barbie life! Pounce into pet paradise with this kitty tower playset. Designed with a spinning palm tree, adjustable leaf bed, and relaxing hammock  there are so many pawesome ways for the two pet kitties to play. Also included is a bag of cat food, bowls, and toys. Doll sold separately. Colors and decorations may vary.

banner_details:
This banner features a vibrant and playful design catered toward a young audience. The left half is filled with a soft pink gradient background with whimsical white decorative elements including bubbles and wavy lines, creating a cheerful and dreamy setting. The banner uses five main text layers identified by their IDs: "heading" for the bold and large title in purple, "subheading" for a smaller subtitle in dark gray, "description" for bulleted product features also in dark gray, and "price" showcasing the cost in a bold, digital-style font. The CTA button has a rounded rectangle shape ("cta_background") in dark purple with the text "cta" in white. On the right, a product image ("product_image") showcases a colorful cat playset, highlighting the toy's elements like palm trees, a hammock, food bowls, and figurines. The layout balances product visuals with text effectively to attract attention and prompt user action.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Pink Gradient: #FFC6E5 → #FFADDA
- Light Gray Gradient: #FBFBFB → #F0F0F0
- Dark Purple: #6B2D71
- White: #FFFFFF
- Dark Gray: #333333
product_color: The product image features a playful, tropical theme with a vibrant and cheerful color palette perfect for a children’s advertisement. Dominant colors include bright pink (#F755A0) for the upper cat house, lush green (#2CAD72) for palm leaves, sandy beige (#F5C49E) for the base, sky blue (#49C7E6) for the hammock and bowl, lavender purple (#B28EDC), and warm orange-brown (#C57C42) for one of the kittens. The white kitten stands out against the colored background. Colors are blended in a complementary yet high-contrast way to highlight individual elements while keeping the overall aesthetic cohesive and lively, ideal for grabbing attention in a banner.
